name: Dinner Tonight: Pasta With Tomatillo Sauce
description: Sure, I’ve got enough turkey leftovers to feed me for a week. But what I’m usually looking for on the day after is some kind of reprieve from all the madness. While I truly love the All-American meal, I usually...
recipeIngredient: Leftover sauce from Batali’s Chicken With Green Sauce recipe

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Season with salt. When boiling toss in the pasta. cook according to package.
When al dente, drain, and toss with the green sauce. Shred some pasta and sprinkle some cilantro atop. Serve up!
